feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: What is the release date for the GTS E4H 2025 version?
entry.content: Will the dates for new release of GTS E4H and S/4HANA Private Cloud edition be synchronized in future?

entry.title: BADI to validate all the warehouse tasks in one go at the time of creation via /scwm/todlv_o
entry.content: Can someone please help with a badi which gets triggered when create or create save buttons are clicked at the time of warehouse task creation either from the /scwm/prdo outbound delivery follow on function or from t code /scwm/todlv_o. It should also let us display the validation or error messages to user in the log section.The badi should get triggered for all the warehouse tasks at once and not one at a time as the requirement is to let the user create the warehouse task for all the line items or for none. Only if all the line items are selected by the user then only we should proceed for warehouse task creation for all line items else no WHT to be created.

entry.title: Lohnbearbeitung - Auslaufsteuerung
entry.content:
Hallo zusammen, ich bin auf folgende SAP Note gestoßen: https://me.sap.com/notes/43636/D.

Die Note beschreibt folgendes: Keine Umleitung der Bereitstellungsbedarfe für Lohnbearbeitung. Bereitstellungsbedarf wird nicht auf das Nachfolgematerial umgeleitet. Bedarf nach dem Auslaufdatum, der nicht gedeckt ist, wird in der Dispoliste mit der Ausnahmemeldung 58 'Ungedeckter Bedarf jenseits Auslaufdatum' gekennzeichnet. Eine Bedarfsdeckung durch neue Bestellvorschläge findet nicht statt.

Grund: Es wird nicht zwischen 'Lohnbearbeiter-Sekundärbedarf' (für Planauftrag, Bestellanforderung) und 'Lohnbearbeiter-Reservierung' (für LB-Bestellung) unterschieden.

Hatte jemand schon das selbe Szenario in einem Projekt bzw. kennt eine Lösung wie man dies Elegant lösen kann?

entry.title: Custom Report in Project System
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We are planning costs on the WBS using unit cost method. The planned costs on a WBS is sum of planned costs for various item categories, obtained using simple multiplication of price and quantity. The costs will be planned in different versions. My client requires a report that compares the price, quantity, value of each item category in different versions for a particular WBS element or for the whole project (but WBS element wise). I am trying to prepare the functional specification of the report for ABAP development. CONSIDER A SITUATION WHERE BUDGET IS NOT PLANNED. I started by passing the project definition in PSPHI table of PRPS table and passing the WBS element in POSID field of the same table. I obtained OBJNR from this. I then passed OBJNR in RPSCO table along with the version in VERSN and obtained the details on planned costs with WRTTP for planned values. I am now unable to understand the link between RPSCO and CKHS table. If I pass OBJNR directly in CKHS, I am able to obtain KALNR. This KALNR is further passed in CKIS table to get the item category wise detail, i.e., price, quantity and value corresponding to each item category. Can you please guide me to establish a link between RPSCO and CKHS table? This link is necessary to pull the version in. If budget is planned, I can directly see BPGE table for VERSN and obtain KALNR and then pass KALNR in CKIS table to obtain the details at the level of item category. Will this still be the solution in cases of no budgets? Thanks

entry.title: CDS View - Casting to Data Element but Field Name is Missing in SE16N
entry.content:
Hello,

Edit: I have changed the language to English as suggested for better understanding but to my surprise now it's working!
I don't know what the problem was but I will drop the whole code here just in case.

The CDS:

@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Alış Faturaları'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZMM_DDL_PUR_INV
  as select from    rseg
    inner join      rbkp   on  rbkp.belnr = rseg.belnr
                           and rbkp.gjahr = rseg.gjahr
    left outer join but000 on but000.partner = rbkp.lifnr
    left outer join mara   on rseg.matnr = mara.matnr
    left outer join t023t  on  t023t.matkl = mara.matkl
                           and t023t.spras = $session.system_language
    left outer join t134t  on  t134t.mtart = mara.mtart
                           and t134t.spras = $session.system_language
    inner join      a003   on  a003.mwskz = rseg.mwskz
                           and a003.kappl = 'TX'
                           and a003.aland = 'TR'
                           and a003.kschl = 'MWVS'
    inner join      konp   on konp.knumh = a003.knumh
{
  key rbkp.bukrs,
  key rbkp.blart,
  key rbkp.belnr,
  key rseg.buzei,
      rseg.shkzg,
      rbkp.xblnr,
      rbkp.budat,
      rbkp.lifnr,
      but000.name_org1,
      rseg.ebeln,
      rseg.ebelp,
      mara.mtart,
      t134t.mtbez,
      mara.matkl,
      t023t.wgbez,
      rseg.matnr,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'bstme'
      rseg.menge,
      rseg.bstme,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'waers'
      cast(
       cast(
         case when rseg.menge <> 0 then cast(rseg.wrbtr as abap.dec(11,2)) / cast(rseg.menge as abap.dec(11,2)) else 0 end
       as abap.dec(11,4))
      as zfi_e_birim_fiyat) as birim_fiyat,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'waers'
      rseg.wrbtr,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'waers'
      cast(
        cast(
          case when konp.kbetr <> 0 then (cast(rseg.wrbtr as abap.dec(11,4)) * cast(konp.kbetr as abap.dec(11,4))) / cast(1000 as abap.dec(11,4)) else 0 end
        as abap.dec(11,4)) 
      as zfi_e_kdv_tutari) as kdv_tutari,
      rbkp.waers
}
where
      rbkp.vgart != 'RS'
  and rbkp.stblg =  ''


In Turkish the field label in the table after I run SE16N query was missing:

But now I translated the data element in English and logged in with English and now it's showing:

Field Labels are entered in both languages:

Edit2: After I entered the English translation to the data element to show you the error, I logged back in Turkish again and now it's working in Turkish too. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

entry.title: Restrict accessible migration projects in 'Migrate your data' application/ LTMOM tcode
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We have requirement to restrict the visibility/accessibility of the projects in the 'Migrate your data' application/ LTMOM tcode through roles.

Can you please suggest the Authorization object which restrict the accessibility of projects in the app/tcode?

entry.title: Van stock visibility without using storage locations
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We currently have our service technician vans represented as storage locations on our ERP, but as we have hundreds of service technicians, this causes a big maintenance effort in terms of customizing due to the usual changes happening with the technicians (new hirings, resignations, change of address, etc).

Does anyone has experience with other solutions (in S/4 or even other SAP products) which could be used to represent the service technician vans and still allow us to have the visibility we have today of the stock existing on each van?

 

Thanks,

Nuno

entry.title: Joint Venture Company in SAP S/4HANA
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud 2023, to implement Joint Venture (JV) company setup, I would like your guidance on the best approach for configuration.

Scenario:

The JV company operates under a parent organization, but we need to maintain separate financial reporting for the JV, including:
⦁ Trial Balance report (specific to the JV)
⦁ Tax declaration report (for statutory filing)
⦁ Access restricted to JV-related plants, project, masters...

Operationally, we want to segregate transactions, assets, and costs.

Constraints:

We cannot proceed with creating a separate Company Code for each JV because there will be multiple Joint Ventures in the future.
I would like to handle the configuration internally (as the client) without engaging an SAP Partner.

Questions:

Can we achieve this by creating a separate Segment and Plant within the same Company Code?
Will this configuration allow us to generate separate Trial Balance and Tax Declaration reports for each JV entity?
What is the recommended approach for data authorization and access control, so that only JV users can access JV-related data?
Are there any best practices or SAP Notes available for such JV setup scenarios?

Objective:

We need your segregation of financials, reporting, and data authorization for the JV company while maintaining integration with the parent organization where necessary.
Any advice, configuration guidance, or reference documentation would be highly appreciated.

Thanks & Regards,
Silambarasan R

entry.title: Extend Display Customer list App - CDS views missing extend contract
entry.content:
Hi,

We are on S/4HANA Private Cloud 2023 version & have a requirement to add the below 6 fields to the, "Display Customer List" Fiori app.

However, when I look at these 2 CDS they do not have the release contracts as set against them:

From what I understand we are only supposed to extend the CDS if it has an extend contract defined & set to released as in the example below:

Any inputs from anyone who added fields to Display Customer list/F2640 app would be greatly appreciated. Thank you

entry.title: What’s the value of C_TS422_2504 and how do you pass it?
entry.content:
Hey everyone,

I’ve been looking into SAP certifications and came across C_TS422_2504 (SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition – Production Planning & Manufacturing Associate) SAP Learning+1. It seems targeted at folks who want to validate skills in manufacturing planning under S/4HANA Cloud Private.

I’m curious:

  • What’s this certification really worth in the job market (especially in manufacturing / supply chain roles)?
  • How do people who passed it recommend preparing — best study materials, practice exams, hands-on experience, etc.?
  • Are there topic areas in the exam that tend to be really tough / high weight?

entry.title: Error message in Fiori app Manage Service Entry Sheet-Lean Services
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm working on S/4 On-premise latest version.

When creating service entry sheet in the Fiori app Manage Service Entry Sheet-Lean Services, I get the error message "Number range interval 01 is not maintained for object SERVICE_ES" (See screen shot).

Checking configuration, the number range 01 is maintained, but it is for different object, and there seems to be no way to add object SERVICE_ES.

Can someone please support if you have ever seen this error message.

Thanks a lot!

entry.title: Best practices for embedding analytics and reporting
entry.content:
Hello Team,

Could you please suggest best practices for embedded analytics and reporting where I have to create custom CDS, custom analytical queries and multi-dimensional reports along with KPI creations.

Best Regards,
Malika Bathla.

entry.title: Drilldown and Navigate to in multi dimensional report of custom analytical queries
entry.content:
Hello Team,

On S/4 Hana private cloud, I have a requirement to create custom analytical queries as end user and be able to add new navigations on my queries and remove few standard navigations coming via standard semantics of added fields.

Is it possible to do so? Can we change the order of navigations shown in custom analytical queries - standard navigations displayed?
Can we remove the one not needed and can we add new for new custom field (if added)?

Also, is it possible to get link on line item shown in the table view of multi dimesional report?

Best Regards,
Malika Bathla.

entry.title: Batch-specific UoM Proportion/product unit of measure GON invalid for item 000010 Message No. VL382
entry.content:
I've a scenario where I have a finished product managed by a Batch-specific UoM with type: Product Unit, and I am facing this error message when I try to make a delivery with the Alternative UoM (Product Unit) Reference to a Sales order with the Base UoM
"The sales Unit (Also the Base UoM) in the sales order is "KG" and the Alternative/required UoM in the Outbound delivery is "GON" 

"GON" UoM is a custom UoM created equivalent to the UoM: "BAG"

Note: this scenario has been tested in MM by creating a PO with UoM: "KG" and MIGO GR by UoM: "GON" and it's working properly

The error message:

Proportion/product unit of measure GON invalid for item 000010

Message No. VL382

entry.title: supplier evaluation with scheduling agreements with no ending date (ending date 9999), possible?
entry.content:
When you make a supplier evaluation with scheduling agreements with no ending date (ending date 9999), does the system include them in the evaluation? In ECC is not possible, as the system only includes scheduling agreements with ending date (closed, and not the ones with 9999 as ending date).

Thanks!

entry.title: Restricting TECO of maintenance order when there is open PO
entry.content:
Hi All, 

I am currently working in SAP S4 Hana Private Cloud version . I am able to perform TECO & business closure of maintenance order when there is open PO ( GR/SES is not done ) . Is there any standard configuration settings available to restrict to perform TECO and Business Closure when there is open PO ? Please shed some light on this .

Thanking you 

Best Regards

entry.title: Invoice Print Type - IDOC vs Form (Fragmented Forms)
entry.content:
Hello Gurus,

I'm looking for some inspiration and war stories from you talented people.
Are we the only ones struggeling with the Print Type settings in the pricing procedure when controlling output in the our Adobe Forms as well as INVOIC IDOC?

Background: In our pricing procedure we're using Print Type to control both line item pricing display on the form as well as determine value in IDOC Segment E1EDP26 (INVOIC02). Business wants these two outpu to differ in certain countries - E.g. Form to show a set of pricing, while IDOC typically containing more.

We have tried: Changing the content of the form directly, supressing values from the Print Type setting, leaving a mismatch between Print Type and actual print. However, using the same form across multiple countries, following method significantly increases complexity.

Have any of you successfully managed to separate the Print Type setting for the form content from IDOC content? Any advice on how to implement the split?

Appreciate you time,
Best regards,
Aske

SAP S/4HANA SD (Sales and Distribution)
